summary:
Lustmord Vampire Armor - Chinese Version

Origin: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25852

Installation
-download the file
-unzip it
-use the .esp file to cover the original one
descriptionHtml:
Requirements:
- Dawnguard installed
- Skyrim patched to at least 1.7

Recommended mods:
Amethyst Hollows My house mod.
Black Sacrament Armor My other armor mod.
Dimonized UNP female body (Warning: NSFW Adult content)
UNP Blessed female body (Warning: NSFW Adult content)
or Caliente CBBE female body (Warning: NSFW Adult content)
Coolsims hair
Apachii Skyhair
Cazy and Demoness hair
Crimson Tide - Extra blood
Realistic Lighting - A nice non-enb non-performance hit lighting mod (the armor\'s metallic shine looks excellent with this mod).
Frostfall - This armor set\'s cloaks are recognized by Frostfall.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Lustmord Vampire Armor
- Modular, multi-component Light Armor system for male and female.
- Simultaneously supports Vanilla/UNP/UNPB/CBBE body types (each craftable separately).
- Independent spell-based crafting system.
- Mini start-up quest: investigate a disturbance near Lost Tongue Overlook.
- Garter pouch: Equippable storage pouch container (access using \"voice\" power).
- Bloodthirst: When equipping a full set of Lustmord armor, you can fuel it with Blood Potions to grant an additional 25% armor bonus (view readme for details)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Installation
-download the file
-unzip it
-use the .esp file to cover the original one
author: AmethystDeceiver
